title: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Senior SDET who will own the design, development, and maintenance of our automation frameworks across Web, and React Native applications. This role requires deep technical expertise in TypeScript/JavaScript, building frameworks from scratch, and working with modern tools such as Playwright, Appium, and WebdriverIO.
   

  

 The Senior SDET will ensure reliable, scalable automation integrated with CI/CD pipelines and executed on cloud device platforms like BrowserStack and AWS Device Farm. Strong communication and collaboration skills are essential, as this role partners closely with Engineering, QA, and Product teams to drive a high\\-quality delivery culture.
   

  

**Duties and Responsibilities:**
* Design and develop automation frameworks for:
* Web using Playwright (TypeScript/JavaScript)
* React Native Android \\& iOS apps using Appium with WebdriverIO \\[TS/JS]
* Build scalable, maintainable automation architecture with reusable utilities, components, and reporting
* Develop robust automated test suites for regression, smoke, and end\\-to\\-end validation
* Execute tests across virtual and real devices using BrowserStack and AWS Device Farm
* Integrate automation into CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI, etc.)
* Diagnose and resolve automation failures, flaky tests, and environment issues
* Collaborate with developers, QA analysts, and product managers to define testability requirements
* Participate in requirement reviews, feature grooming, and design discussions
* Maintain automation documentation, best practices, and coding standards
* Communicate clearly with cross\\-functional teams and ensure transparency on automation progress and risks


**Requirements**
 Must Haves
   

  

* 6\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in QA Automation / SDET roles
* Strong hands\\-on experience in test automation, specifically building frameworks from scratch
* Proficiency in TypeScript/JavaScript
* Expertise with:
* Playwright for Web UI automation
* Appium \\+ WebdriverIO for Android/iOS React Native apps
* Experience running automation on BrowserStack, AWS Device Farm, or similar cloud platforms
* Solid understanding of CI/CD pipelines and Git
* Strong debugging skills for both web and mobile applications
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively
* Must be comfortable to work in the US hours at least till 2:30 pm EST


 Nice to Have
   

  

* Experience with API automation (Playwright API, Postman, or other tools)
* Familiarity with performance, network, or accessibility testing
* Experience with Docker or containerized execution environments
* Knowledge of Allure, ReportPortal, or similar reporting tools
* Exposure to advanced mobile testing scenarios (deep links, notifications, analytics validation)
* Experience mentoring junior QA or SDET engineers

title: Django Engineer
description:

 ManufApp

With a team that blends deep industry experience and fresh energy, we take a hands\\-on, customer\\-first approach to everything we do‚Äîand we make sure to enjoy the journey as much as the destination.

title: Lead Cloud Engineer
description:
We are looking for a Lead Cloud Engineer to serve as the technical leader of our DevOps function, with deep expertise in AWS infrastructure, reliability engineering, and operational excellence. This role is ideal for a senior\\-level engineer who has experience leading other team members designing and operating production systems at scale and is comfortable owning cloud architecture decisions end\\-to\\-end.
   

  

 As a Lead Cloud Engineer, you will define AWS standards, guide platform architecture, and lead initiatives that improve scalability, security, performance, and cost efficiency. You will partner closely with application engineers and other engineering team members to ensure systems are production\\-ready, observable, and resilient, while mentoring other engineers and raising the overall DevOps and cloud maturity of the organization.
   

  

 Essential Job Functions:
   

  

**AWS Cloud Architecture \\& Platform Leadership**
* Lead the design and evolution of AWS infrastructure supporting highly available, scalable production systems
* Define architectural standards and best practices across AWS services such as VPC, EC2, ECS/EKS, RDS, S3, ALB/NLB, IAM, and CloudFront
* Lead cloud\\-level decision making, including trade\\-offs around scalability, reliability, cost, and operational complexity
* Drive cloud modernization initiatives and guide teams toward resilient, well\\-architected AWS solutions that scale


**Infrastructure as Code \\& Automation**
* Own and maintain infrastructure as code using Terraform and/or CloudFormation
* Design reusable, modular infrastructure components that enable consistency across environments
* Build automation for provisioning, configuration, scaling, and lifecycle management of AWS resources
* Eliminate manual operational tasks through scripting, tooling, and platform improvements


**Reliability, Monitoring \\& Incident Response**
* Define and own monitoring, logging, and alerting standards across AWS and application services
* Build observability using tools such as Datadog, CloudWatch, Prometheus, or equivalent
* Lead infrastructure\\-related incident response, including coordination, mitigation, and communication in achievement of RTO and RPO objectives
* Conduct thorough root\\-cause analysis and drive long\\-term reliability improvements


**Database Performance Optimization \\& Scaling**
* Partner with application engineers to ensure databases are performant, scalable, and cost\\-effective
* Optimize AWS database services such as RDS and Aurora for performance, availability, and growth
* Analyze and improve query performance, indexing strategies, connection management, and resource utilization
* Design and implement scaling strategies including read replicas, storage scaling, and high\\-availability configurations
* Monitor database performance and proactively address bottlenecks before they impact customers
* Support backup, recovery, and disaster\\-recovery strategies aligned with business requirements


**Security, Compliance \\& Cost Management**
* Implement AWS security best practices including IAM, network segmentation, encryption, and audit logging
* Support SOC 2 and other compliance efforts through secure infrastructure design and change controls
* Monitor and optimize AWS costs, driving efficient resource usage without compromising reliability
* Ensure infrastructure changes follow defined approval, review, and documentation processes


**Leadership \\& Cross\\-Functional Collaboration**
* Act as a technical leader and mentor for DevOps and platform engineers
* Set expectations and standards for operational excellence across engineering teams
* Communicate architecture decisions, system risks, and operational status clearly to technical and non\\-technical stakeholders
* Take full ownership of cloud initiatives from design through implementation and ongoing operations


**Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
* 8\\+ years of experience in cloud infrastructure, DevOps, or site reliability engineering roles
* Experience leading other cloud or platform engineers, devops engineer, or site reliability engineers
* Deep, hands\\-on expertise with AWS running production environments
* Strong experience with infrastructure as code (Terraform strongly preferred)
* Strong understanding of AWS networking, IAM, security, and high\\-availability patterns
* Experience optimizing and scaling cloud\\-managed databases (RDS, Aurora, or similar)
* Demonstrated leadership in incident response and operational decision\\-making
* Strong scripting and automation skills (Bash, Python, or equivalent)
* Experience supporting compliance frameworks such as SOC 2
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to lead without micromanagement
* Highly accountable, proactive, and comfortable owning critical infrastructure systems
* Must be comfortable working in US hours at least till 5 pm EST

title: Flutter Developer Intern

With a client\\-focused approach, Technocrats Horizons delivers cost\\-effective services tailored to meet diverse industry needs.

 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role for a Senior Software Quality Assurance Engineer at our Ludhiana office. Daily responsibilities include conducting manual testing, identifying software issues, and collaborating closely with the development team to optimize product performance and resolve defects. title: Network Engineer (Standard)
description:
**Roles \\& Responsibilities**
 Job Title: IP Deployment Engineer
   

  

 Location: India
   

  

 We are seeking a IP Deployment Engineer to join our team, tasked with deploying and supporting one of the world's largest and most intricate networks. The ideal candidate is a proactive, quick learner, and highly motivated individual who thrives in a fast\\-paced, dynamic environment. This role requires a creative problem\\-solver who challenges the status quo and brings innovative solutions to everyday issues. The successful candidate will also possess excellent communication skills, capable of building strong relationships with internal teams and external partners such as vendors and contractors.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Collaborate with Program Managers and Network Engineering to define site design requirements and develop project implementation and migration plans. This includes creating and reviewing deployment packages such as Engineering Design Packages (EDP), Scope of Works (SoW), Method of Procedures (MoP), Rack Face Elevations (RFE), and Bill of Materials (BoM).
* Provide technical leadership and guidance, both remotely and on\\-site, for network upgrades and new PoP site builds. This covers areas like power, cooling, rack layout, cable management, equipment installation, network configuration, testing, and production traffic handoff.
* Calculate and document power and space requirements for equipment at multiple PoP sites. Coordinate with Colocation Vendors, local Engineering, and Facilities Operations to meet these requirements.
* Actively contribute to the improvement of documentation, automation, and processes.
* Design cages and racks, understanding the current and future needs of PoP infrastructure.


**Minimum Qualifications**
* Over 5 years of experience in deploying and supporting network hardware platforms and architectures, including Cisco and/or Juniper routers/switches.
* Proficiency in configuring and troubleshooting IP routing/switching technologies and protocols such as TCP/IP, BGP, ISIS, OSPF, and MPLS in a dual\\-stack IPv4/6 environment.
* Experience in coordinating and executing large\\-scale hardware installations and configurations.
* Demonstrated ability to lead and execute complex network deployment projects with meticulous attention to detail.
* Strong interaction skills with vendors and external parties to ensure project completion.
* Experience with cage design using tools like MS Visio/Omnigraffle for layouts and rack elevations.
* Familiarity with Data Center electrical and cooling configurations (IEC, NEMA, AC/DC power, and power redundancy scenarios).
* Experience with Linux/OS tools.
* Ability to work effectively in a global team environment with minimal supervision.
* Preferred Qualifications:
* Certifications such as CCNP or JNCIP preferred; Expert\\-level certifications are a plus.
* Experience with scripting and automation.
* Experience in coordinating and executing projects involving the deployment of optical communication equipment (DWDM), site preparations, and OTDR testing is desirable.


**Experience**
* 4\\.5\\-6 Years


**Skills**
* Primary Skill: Network Engineer
* Sub Skill(s): Network Engineer
* Additional Skill(s): C\\+\\+, REST APIs, LAN, Network Operations, Linux Server, Firewall, API Automation


**About The Company**
 Infogain is a human\\-centered digital platform and software engineering company based out of Silicon Valley. We engineer business outcomes for Fortune 500 companies and digital natives in the technology, healthcare, insurance, travel, telecom, and retail \\& CPG industries using technologies such as cloud, microservices, automation, IoT, and artificial intelligence. We accelerate experience\\-led transformation in the delivery of digital platforms. Infogain is also a Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) Gold Partner and Azure Expert Managed Services Provider (MSP).
   

  

 Infogain, an Apax Funds portfolio company, has offices in California, Washington, Texas, the UK, the UAE, and Singapore, with delivery centers in Seattle, Houston, Austin, Krak√≥w, Noida, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Pune, and Bengaluru.

title: Network Engineer (Associate)
description:
**Roles \\& Responsibilities**
 Role Overview:
   

  

 As a Data Centre Provisioning Engineer will be responsible for supporting the deployment, activation, and operational excellence of hyperscale data centre network infrastructure. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams and external partners to ensure seamless provisioning, troubleshooting, and optimization of network systems.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
 Engineering \\& Troubleshooting
   

  

 Minimum 3\\+ years of experience in troubleshooting network Layer 1, 2, and 3 issues, preferably within AI fabric, 3\\-tier Leaf and Spine, NSF, and Optical networks.
   

  

 Provide direct engineering support to Data Center Construction, NetOps, FacOps, activation, and audit teams.
   

  

 Respond to hardware, software, network, design, or tooling issues; create and manage tickets, and drive network\\-related issues to resolution.
   

  

 Incident Response \\& Deployment
   

  

 Lead data centre deployment using zero\\-touch provisioning tools to bring entire data halls online rapidly.
   

  

 Track and resolve reliability, security, and continuity issues during hyperscale infrastructure deployment.
   

  

 Collaborate closely with cross\\-functional teams, MSPs, and third\\-party vendors.
   

  

 Operational Leadership
   

  

 Indirectly manage large teams responsible for racking, stacking, auditing, cabling, and testing thousands of network switches.
   

  

 Establish and enforce network standards, ensuring compliance with client policies.
   

  

 Escalation Management
   

  

 Participate in on\\-call rotation to resolve or re\\-route issues as needed.
   

  

 Identify opportunities for process, tool, skill, or automation improvements to reduce future escalations.
   

  

 Data Measurement \\& Automation
   

  

 Sequence, schedule, and manage multiple dependent projects on hyperscale datacenter fabrics.
   

  

 Develop workflow automations for large\\-scale network switch deployments.
   

  

 Edit and manage large databases that integrate multiple systems in real time.
   

  

 Enhance the quality and quantity of reported metrics, focusing on escalation issues, fault/event trends, tooling failure rates, and vendor performance.
   

  

**Required Skills**
 Data analytics and reporting
   

  

 Troubleshooting internetwork routing and switching at datacenter scale
   

  

 Bash and Python scripting for device automation via CLI
   

  

 SDN automation experience
   

  

 Fiber optic circuit troubleshooting, including MTP fanouts
   

  

 Knowledge of datacenter space, power, IEC, and NEMA specifications
   

  

 Experience with rack, fiber, patch panel, and device inventory (including board, chipset, firmware, and kernel auditing)
   

  

 Equipment and IP deployment expertise
   

  

 IPv6 routing and switching, including SLAAC
   

  

 Zero Touch Provisioning (ZTP) via PXEboot, TFTP, and SLAAC
   

  

**Preferred Qualifications**
 Experience working with large\\-scale, hyperscale data centre environments
   

  

 Strong collaboration skills with internal and external stakeholders
   

  

 Proven ability to drive process improvements and automation initiatives
   

  

**Experience**
* 2\\-3 Years


**Skills**
* Primary Skill: Network Engineer
* Sub Skill(s): Network Engineer
* Additional Skill(s): LAN, Network Operations, Firewall

 or

 or similar certification preferred.

**Senior UX Designer**
**Role Summary**
**As a Senior UX Designer, you will lead the design strategy for complex digital products, driving the**
**user experience vision and ensuring the design is aligned with both user needs and business**
**objectives. You conduct in\\-depth user research, create high\\-level design concepts, and oversee the**

**flows, and ensure a seamless user experience across multiple platforms. They also advocate for best**

* Lead design strategy for complex digital products with a mobile\\-first approach.
* Ensure a seamless, cohesive user experience across the UX ecosystem.
* Conduct usability testing and gather insights in collaboration with UX Researchers, leveraging


**both qualitative and quantitative methods.**

* Align design decisions with business objectives and technical constraints to ensure feasibility.
* Manage and evolve design frameworks, systems, and guidelines for consistency and scalability.
* Track and analyze UX metrics, using data\\-driven insights to refine and iterate on designs.

**society.**

**charitableimpact.com**

**courage, kindness, respect, and generosity‚Äîwhile fostering equitable and inclusive experiences for**
**all.**
**For This Role Specifically, We Are Seeking**
* 5\\+ years of UX design experience with a strong track record of delivering impactful solutions.
* Undergraduate degree in a relevant discipline.
* A compelling portfolio showcasing expertise in both UX and UI design.
* Deep mastery of UX/UI principles, best practices, and industry\\-standard design tools (e.g., Figma,


**Abstract).**

* Experience working in Agile environments, using collaborative tools like JIRA and Confluence.

**solutions.**
* Strong visual and interaction design skills, with an eye for layout, typography, and visual


**hierarchy.**
* Ability to balance business goals with user needs, driving meaningful product value.
* Proven success in cross\\-functional collaboration within dynamic, fast\\-paced environments.
* Data\\-informed decision\\-making, blending analytical insights with design intuition.
* Experience designing for iterative, experimental, and evolving features.
* Open\\-minded, egoless learner, receptive to constructive feedback and continuous improvement.
* Exceptional communication and presentation skills to articulate design decisions effectively.
* Highly proactive, organized, and adaptable, thriving in ambiguity.
* Self\\-sufficient while excelling in team collaboration, ensuring seamless execution in fast\\-moving


**projects.**
